name: Deadly Outlines
description:
Do you like arcade games? Do you like the frenetic experience of dodging bullets and ships? Are you in the mood for a quick, easy to play but fun game? Then this is the right choice!

Deadly Outlines is an arcade game where you are a circle trying to survive surrounded by dangers. Dodge anything a different color from your circle, attack anything the same color, that's it.

You earn points by surviving and by destroying the enemy ships, and you can dash to make this easier, the objective is to get the best score possible. It's a quick and easy game that can still get you a lot of fun. You can play just a few minutes every so often, or go at full for the highest score, your choice.

So, what's the highest score you can get?
